Header: Beedi leaves and Kerala cannabis seized by the Navy
Content: The Navy has arrested a person with 192 kilogrammes of beedi leaves. The Navy also said that they have apprehended three persons with Kerala Ganja. The beedi leaves has been taken into custody during a raid carried out by the Navy along with the Special Task Force in the Tharapuram area in Mannar. The beedi leaves was wrapped in eleven parcels and hidden in a house. The Special Task Force is carrying out further investigations into the suspects and the beedi leaves. In the meantime, three suspects have been taken into custody along with 750 grams of Kerala ganja from the Akkaraipattu area. They were arrested while plying on a motorbike.
